Sentencas: A conventional gas turbine has potential to generate power but suffers from significant losses in the form of exhaust.

Sentencas: Through hybridization, there are more options for improving performance.

Sentencas: To do this, a high-temperature fuel cell known as a solid oxide fuel cell is combined with the traditional system to create a hybrid that offers significant improvements in both quantitative and qualitative performance.

Sentencas: First law of thermodynamics gives the quantitative results, whereas second law of thermodynamics gives a qualitative result.

Sentencas: Performance of hybrid system is validated with the published results.

Sentencas: The hybrid system achieves efficiency of energy and exergy efficiency of 61.46% and 59.9%, respectively, at pressure ratio 4 and turbine inlet temperature 1250 K. A unique performance map also presented for the proposed configuration and compared the nature of the curve.
